pages.text: $(li)The Glowstone Canyon is a biome composed mostly of Shimmer and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/glowstone_block)Glowstone$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)You can find Brown Mushrooms and Luminous Fungus here.

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/blindsight)Blindsights$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/infernal_expansion/glowsquito)Glowsquitos$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Glowstone Canyon$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
